text: This place is seriously great- food, service, drinks, everything. I get the <catch of the day> almost every time I come (4ish times a month) and it never disappoints, AND the <Caesar salad> is probably the best in the area. Also, the wait staff is phenomenal. Had vegan friends visiting several weeks ago and our waiter went way out of his way to accommodate.
